summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 E-TON PN2B/BEAMER 50. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS INCLUDED IN THE RECALL ASSOCIATED WITH NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 11V189000 (ELECTRICAL SYSTEM:IGNITION:SWITCH). AN AUTHORIZED DEALER WAS NOTIFIED AND THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THEY WOULD HAVE TO ORDER THE NECESSARY PARTS TO REPAIR THE VEHICLE. AFTER APPROXIMATELY TWO MONTHS, THE PARTS WERE STILL UNAVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE, AND THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE PARTS WOULD BE SHIPPED TO THE DEALERS. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNKNOWN. THE VIN WAS UNAVAILABLE.
